name: Undistractify StackOverflow Enhanced
description: Remove all the distracting stuff (other sites, chat rooms, meta posts, ads) from your vision, focusing in on resolving your technical problems first. Based on hardy tomâ€™s original Undistractify StackOverflow but adds removal of simple sidebar ads along with requests to join the site (for when you're signed out & don't want to bother signing in). Also adds more StackExchange domains that this style will apply to.
